 2022-12652022-12-02,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  FIN
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Crown Corporation General Regulations, 1995
PrecisRegulations Amending the CROWN CORPORATION GENERAL REGULATIONS, 1995 in order to exempt the Canada Growth Fund and its wholly-owned subsidiaries from section 91 of the Financial Administration Act, which requires Crown corporations to seek GIC approval of certain transactions.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0257 Publication Date: 2022-12-21
AttachmentsAttachment
